@@ -1,14 +1,31 @@
-import pyodbc  
+from twilio.rest import Client
+import random
 
-conn = pyodbc.connect(
-    "DRIVER={ODBC Driver 17 for SQL Server};"
-    "SERVER=localhost;"
-    "DATABASE=YourDB;"
-    "UID=your_user;"
-    "PWD=your_password"
+# ‚úÖ Generate 5-digit OTP
+def generate_otp():
+    return random.randint(10000, 99999)
+
+# Twilio credentials (from your Twilio Console)
+account_sid = "ACxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx"
+auth_token = "your_auth_token"
+twilio_number = "+1234567890"  # Your Twilio phone number
+
+client = Client(account_sid, auth_token)
+
+# User phone number (should come from your app / DB)
+user_phone = "+639123456789"
+
+# Generate OTP
+otp = generate_otp()
+
+# Save OTP (you can store in database, Redis, or session)
+print(f"Generated OTP: {otp}")
+
+# Send SMS
+message = client.messages.create(
+    body=f"Your OTP code is {otp}",
+    from_=twilio_number,
+    to=user_phone
 )
-cursor = conn.cursor()
-cursor.execute("SELECT @@VERSION;")
 
-for row in cursor:
-    print(row)
+print(f"‚úÖ Sent OTP {otp} to {user_phone}, SID: {message.sid}")

-# Generate OTP

-conn.close()
+# üîπ Login user
+@app.route("/login", methods=["POST"])
+def login():
+    data = request.json
+    email = data.get("email")
+    password = data.get("password")
+
+    conn = get_conn()
+    cursor = conn.cursor()
+    cursor.execute("SELECT UserID, FullName, Email, Password, ContactNum, Cart FROM Users WHERE Email=? AND Password=?", (email, password))
+    row = cursor.fetchone()
+    conn.close()
+
+    if row:
+        return jsonify({
+            "userID": row[0],
+            "fullName": row[1],
+            "email": row[2],
+            "contactNum": row[4],
+            "cart": row[5]
+        })
+    else:
+        return jsonify({"error": "Invalid credentials"}), 401
+
+# üîπ Add to cart
+@app.route("/cart/add", methods=["POST"])
+def add_to_cart():
+    data = request.json
+    user_id = data.get("userID")
+    book = data.get("book")  # {title, price, image}
+
+    conn = get_conn()
+    cursor = conn.cursor()
+    cursor.execute("SELECT Cart FROM Users WHERE UserID=?", (user_id,))
+    row = cursor.fetchone()
+    if row:
+        import json
+        cart = json.loads(row[0]) if row[0] else []
+        cart.append(book)
+        cursor.execute("UPDATE Users SET Cart=? WHERE UserID=?", (json.dumps(cart), user_id))
+        conn.commit()
+    conn.close()
+    return jsonify({"success": True, "cart": cart})
+
+if __name__ == "__main__":
+    app.run(debug=True)

@@ -32,6 +39,51 @@
     else:
         return jsonify({"error": "Invalid credentials"}), 401
 
 
+# ‚úÖ Add-to-cart route
+@app.route('/add_to_cart', methods=['POST'])
+def add_to_cart():
+    data = request.json
+    email = data.get("email")
+    title = data.get("title")
+    price = data.get("price")
+    image = data.get("image")
+
+    if not email or not title:
+        return jsonify({"error": "Missing required fields"}), 400
+
+    try:
+        conn = get_db_connection()
+        cursor = conn.cursor()
+
+        # Get user ID by email
+        cursor.execute("SELECT UserID FROM Users WHERE Email=?", (email,))
+        user = cursor.fetchone()
+        if not user:
+            conn.close()
+            return jsonify({"error": "User not found"}), 404
+
+        user_id = user[0]
+
+        # Check if item already in cart
+        cursor.execute("SELECT * FROM Cart WHERE UserID=? AND Title=?", (user_id, title))
+        if cursor.fetchone():
+            conn.close()
+            return jsonify({"error": "Book already in cart"}), 409
+
+        # Insert new cart item
+        cursor.execute(
+            "INSERT INTO Cart (UserID, Title, Price, Image) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?)",
+            (user_id, title, price, image)
+        )
+        conn.commit()
+        conn.close()
+
+        return jsonify({"message": f"'{title}' added to cart successfully"}), 200
+
+    except Exception as e:
+        return jsonify({"error": str(e)}), 500
+
+
 if __name__ == "__main__":
     app.run(debug=True)
